attributes.title: Worst app in my phone rn

attributes.title: Horrible app!
attributes.review: Super un informing and unimportant information!! Instead of talking about important things going on in the world like the crisis in Yemen, and ice detention centers, it focuses on things like campaigns, sad!

attributes.title: This app is trash.
attributes.review: Why I say this app is trash is because. It keeps lagging has ads of a scary looking orange monster. It’s just a terrible app in general!

attributes.title: what’s the point in this app
attributes.review: what is the point in this app when more than half of the united states hates trump. it’s most likely he won’t even be re elected if he keeps trying to take things from us that’s not his, i’m sorry but this app is no use and has no point in it.

attributes.title: Don’t give 5 stars
attributes.review: If you give 5 stars your racist but if you don’t your a good human, also this is made by trump and trump is the worst president

attributes.title: THIS APP IS MADE ME EAT MY BLENDER
attributes.review: This app is a waste of time the instructions were so unclear I ended up eating my blender then DIEING in it was UECCEPTABLE ONE STAR FOR ME I hate this app how dare anyone make this app it was no point of killing me!!! 😭 NOW IM DEAD....AND MY DAD NEVER CANE BACK WITH THE MILK!!!!! thanks a lot

attributes.title: horrible app design
attributes.review: downloaded loaded this app but it spawned a massive cockroach outta my phone i’ve been stuck in the bathroom for 7 days because of this i had to sacrifice my grandma to the bug i’ve become a skinny legged because i haven’t ate 😔i’m starting to see the yaoi gods wish me luck everyone 😍

attributes.title: No
attributes.review: Thought there was hope but there is not

attributes.title: Badddd
